definition: A container or wrapping specifically designed for storing and transporting items related to sustenance, typically found in grocery stores or food markets.

examples.english: The food packaging is made of plastic.
The food packaging is environmentally friendly.
The food packaging is well sealed.

examples.english: The food packaging is easy to open.
